```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

file_name <- here::here("data","flickr-photos.rds")
all_photos <- readRDS(file=file_name)
htmlcode <- "<center>\n<img src='%s' width='%s'  height='%s' class='preview-image'>\n<br/>\n**%s** by <a href='https://www.flickr.com/photos/jferrer/%s' target='flickr'>%s @ flickr</a><br/></center>"
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
seleccion <- c("Sembrando Nogales en el IVIC")
show_photo <- all_photos %>% filter(title %in% seleccion) %>% 
    transmute(code = sprintf(htmlcode, url_m, width_m, height_m, title, id, ownername)) %>% pull()
cat(show_photo)
```

## Galer√≠a de fotos


```{r}
#| echo: false
seleccion <- c("Insomnia01", "Insomnia02", "Insomnia03")

photos <- all_photos %>% filter(title %in% seleccion) %>% slice_sample()

paths <- all_photos %>% filter(title %in% seleccion) %>% pull(url_m)
captions <- all_photos %>% filter(title %in% seleccion) %>% 
  transmute(caption=sprintf("<strong>%s</strong> by <a href='https://www.flickr.com/photos/jferrer/%s' target='flickr'>%s @ flickr</a>",title,id, ownername)) %>% pull()

pixgallery(paths, caption=captions)
```
